definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: NAVTEX(Navigation Telex) system can only broadcast maritime security information at present.
sentences.chinese: 現有的奈伏泰斯系統只能播發英文的海上安全信息。

sentences.english: The announcer interrupted the radio music to give a special piece of news.
sentences.chinese: 播音員停止播放音樂，開始播發一條重要新聞。

sentences.english: Broadcast the data to the vessels from the overland users.
sentences.chinese: 向船舶播發來自陸上用戶的數據。
